title: Miley and Cody Touching Tongues While Wearing Joker Masks Will Haunt You
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson just shared a video of themselves touching tongues...using a Joker mask Instagram filter.

Miley and Cody have been dating for a couple weeks following Miley's split from Kaitlynn Carter.

Happy Monday, Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson are still dating. In fact, they've taken things to the next level by touching tongues in an Instagram video. Which yes, might cause you to have terrifying flashbacks to that viral-in-a-scary-way Shawn Mendes Camila Cabello kiss, so I'll give you a moment.

Anyway, yeah, Miley and Cody just shared a clip of themselves cozied up in bed together using an absolutely terrifying Joker movie filter that will haunt my nightmares for years to come. And trust: watching two people, no matter how hot they are, put their tongues together in clown masks is a lot for a Monday morning with no coffee. So don't say I didn't warn you:









Anyway, Cody and Miley have only been dating for a few weeks in the wake of Miley's recent breakup with Kaitlynn Carter (and Liam Hemsworth!) but they appear to be getting pretty serious?

At least that's the vibe I'm getting from Cody, who told People, "I’m very happy. We are very, very happy. She’s creative. She’s very passionate about what she does, and I’m very similar in that sense. That’s why we get along so well. We just have a ball, yeah, and that’s the most important part of a relationship, you know? The reason why it hasn’t been a really crazy sudden thing is just because we’ve been friends for so long...[we] found each other again in a space where we’re both not partying, working real hard, and it just keeps things healthy and it’s good."

Cute! But before we go, here's this *scampers away*:

View photos Photo credit: Giphy More

description: Wow, just when I'd recovered from Camila and Shawn.
